entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 09 January 2023
